00040 #include <cstring>
00041 #include "tgc.h"
00042 #include "tgf.h"

00044 #include "Matrix4x4.h"
00045 
00046 Matrix4x4::Matrix4x4( )
00047 : RefCount()
00048 {
00049         for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00050                 for( int j = 0; j < 4; ++j )
00051                 {
00052                         if( i == j ) m[i][j] = 1.0;
00053                         else m[i][j] = 0.0;
00054                 }
00055 }
00056 
00057 Matrix4x4::Matrix4x4( double array[4][4] )
00058 : RefCount()
00059 {
00060         memcpy( m, array, 16*sizeof( double ) );
00061 }
00062 
00063 Matrix4x4::Matrix4x4( double t00, double t01, double t02, double t03,
00064                           double t10, double t11, double t12, double t13,
00065                           double t20, double t21, double t22, double t23,
00066                           double t30, double t31, double t32, double t33 )
00067 : RefCount()
00068 {
00069         m[0][0] = t00; m[0][1] = t01; m[0][2] = t02; m[0][3] = t03;
00070         m[1][0] = t10; m[1][1] = t11; m[1][2] = t12; m[1][3] = t13;
00071         m[2][0] = t20; m[2][1] = t21; m[2][2] = t22; m[2][3] = t23;
00072         m[3][0] = t30; m[3][1] = t31; m[3][2] = t32; m[3][3] = t33;
00073 }
00074 
00075 Matrix4x4::Matrix4x4( const Matrix4x4& rhs )
00076 : RefCount()
00077 {
00078         for ( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00079                 for ( int j = 0; j < 4; ++j) m[i][j] = rhs.m[i][j];
00080 }
00081 
00082 Matrix4x4::~Matrix4x4( )
00083 {
00084 }
00085 
00086 bool Matrix4x4::operator==( const Matrix4x4& matrix ) const
00087 {
00088         if( this == &matrix ) return true;
00089     else
00090     return(
00091         ( fabs( m[0][0] - matrix.m[0][0]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00092         ( fabs( m[0][1] - matrix.m[0][1]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00093         ( fabs( m[0][2] - matrix.m[0][2]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00094         ( fabs( m[0][3] - matrix.m[0][3]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00095         ( fabs( m[1][0] - matrix.m[1][0]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00096         ( fabs( m[1][1] - matrix.m[1][1]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00097         ( fabs( m[1][2] - matrix.m[1][2]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00098         ( fabs( m[1][3] - matrix.m[1][3]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00099         ( fabs( m[2][0] - matrix.m[2][0]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00100         ( fabs( m[2][1] - matrix.m[2][1]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00101         ( fabs( m[2][2] - matrix.m[2][2]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00102         ( fabs( m[2][3] - matrix.m[2][3]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00103         ( fabs( m[3][0] - matrix.m[3][0]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00104         ( fabs( m[3][1] - matrix.m[3][1]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00105         ( fabs( m[3][2] - matrix.m[3][2]) < tgc::Epsilon ) &&
00106         ( fabs( m[3][3] - matrix.m[3][3]) < tgc::Epsilon ) );
00107 }
00108 
00109 Ptr<Matrix4x4> Matrix4x4::Transpose( ) const
00110 {
00111         return new Matrix4x4( m[0][0], m[1][0], m[2][0], m[3][0],
00112                               m[0][1], m[1][1], m[2][1], m[3][1],
00113                               m[0][2], m[1][2], m[2][2], m[3][2],
00114                               m[0][3], m[1][3], m[2][3], m[3][3] );
00115 }
00116 
00117 Ptr<Matrix4x4> Matrix4x4::Inverse( ) const
00118 {
00119         double det = m[0][1]*m[1][3]*m[2][2]*m[3][0] - m[0][1]*m[1][2]*m[2][3]*m[3][0] - m[0][0]*m[1][3]*m[2][2]*m[3][1] + m[0][0]*m[1][2]*m[2][3]*m[3][1]
00120                 -m[0][1]*m[1][3]*m[2][0]*m[3][2] + m[0][0]*m[1][3]*m[2][1]*m[3][2] + m[0][1]*m[1][0]*m[2][3]*m[3][2] - m[0][0]*m[1][1]*m[2][3]*m[3][2]
00121                             +m[0][3]*(  m[1][2]*m[2][1]*m[3][0] - m[1][1]*m[2][2]*m[3][0] - m[1][2]*m[2][0]*m[3][1] + m[1][0]*m[2][2]*m[3][1] + m[1][1]*m[2][0]*m[3][2] - m[1][0]*m[2][1]*m[3][2] )
00122                             +m[3][3]*(  m[0][1]*m[1][2]*m[2][0] - m[0][0]*m[1][2]*m[2][1] - m[0][1]*m[1][0]*m[2][2] + m[0][0]*m[1][1]*m[2][2] )
00123                             +m[0][2]*( -m[1][3]*m[2][1]*m[3][0] + m[1][1]*m[2][3]*m[3][0] + m[1][3]*m[2][0]*m[3][1] - m[1][0]*m[2][3]*m[3][1] - m[1][1]*m[2][0]*m[3][3] + m[1][0]*m[2][1]*m[3][3]);
00124 
00125         if ( fabs( det ) < tgc::Epsilon ) tgf::SevereError( "Singular matrix in Matrix4x4::Inverse()" );
00126         double alpha = 1.0/det;
00127 
00128         double inv00 = ( -m[1][3]*m[2][2]*m[3][1] + m[1][2]*m[2][3]*m[3][1] + m[1][3]*m[2][1]*m[3][2] - m[1][1]*m[2][3]*m[3][2] - m[1][2]*m[2][1]*m[3][3] + m[1][1]*m[2][2]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00129         double inv01 = (  m[0][3]*m[2][2]*m[3][1] - m[0][2]*m[2][3]*m[3][1] - m[0][3]*m[2][1]*m[3][2] + m[0][1]*m[2][3]*m[3][2] + m[0][2]*m[2][1]*m[3][3] - m[0][1]*m[2][2]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00130         double inv02 = ( -m[0][3]*m[1][2]*m[3][1] + m[0][2]*m[1][3]*m[3][1] + m[0][3]*m[1][1]*m[3][2] - m[0][1]*m[1][3]*m[3][2] - m[0][2]*m[1][1]*m[3][3] + m[0][1]*m[1][2]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00131         double inv03 = (  m[0][3]*m[1][2]*m[2][1] - m[0][2]*m[1][3]*m[2][1] - m[0][3]*m[1][1]*m[2][2] + m[0][1]*m[1][3]*m[2][2] + m[0][2]*m[1][1]*m[2][3] - m[0][1]*m[1][2]*m[2][3] )*alpha;
00132         double inv10 = (  m[1][3]*m[2][2]*m[3][0] - m[1][2]*m[2][3]*m[3][0] - m[1][3]*m[2][0]*m[3][2] + m[1][0]*m[2][3]*m[3][2] + m[1][2]*m[2][0]*m[3][3] - m[1][0]*m[2][2]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00133         double inv11 = ( -m[0][3]*m[2][2]*m[3][0] + m[0][2]*m[2][3]*m[3][0] + m[0][3]*m[2][0]*m[3][2] - m[0][0]*m[2][3]*m[3][2] - m[0][2]*m[2][0]*m[3][3] + m[0][0]*m[2][2]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00134         double inv12 = (  m[0][3]*m[1][2]*m[3][0] - m[0][2]*m[1][3]*m[3][0] - m[0][3]*m[1][0]*m[3][2] + m[0][0]*m[1][3]*m[3][2] + m[0][2]*m[1][0]*m[3][3] - m[0][0]*m[1][2]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00135         double inv13 = ( -m[0][3]*m[1][2]*m[2][0] + m[0][2]*m[1][3]*m[2][0] + m[0][3]*m[1][0]*m[2][2] - m[0][0]*m[1][3]*m[2][2] - m[0][2]*m[1][0]*m[2][3] + m[0][0]*m[1][2]*m[2][3] )*alpha;
00136         double inv20 = ( -m[1][3]*m[2][1]*m[3][0] + m[1][1]*m[2][3]*m[3][0] + m[1][3]*m[2][0]*m[3][1] - m[1][0]*m[2][3]*m[3][1] - m[1][1]*m[2][0]*m[3][3] + m[1][0]*m[2][1]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00137         double inv21 = (  m[0][3]*m[2][1]*m[3][0] - m[0][1]*m[2][3]*m[3][0] - m[0][3]*m[2][0]*m[3][1] + m[0][0]*m[2][3]*m[3][1] + m[0][1]*m[2][0]*m[3][3] - m[0][0]*m[2][1]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00138         double inv22 = ( -m[0][3]*m[1][1]*m[3][0] + m[0][1]*m[1][3]*m[3][0] + m[0][3]*m[1][0]*m[3][1] - m[0][0]*m[1][3]*m[3][1] - m[0][1]*m[1][0]*m[3][3] + m[0][0]*m[1][1]*m[3][3] )*alpha;
00139         double inv23 = (  m[0][3]*m[1][1]*m[2][0] - m[0][1]*m[1][3]*m[2][0] - m[0][3]*m[1][0]*m[2][1] + m[0][0]*m[1][3]*m[2][1] + m[0][1]*m[1][0]*m[2][3] - m[0][0]*m[1][1]*m[2][3] )*alpha;
00140         double inv30 = (  m[1][2]*m[2][1]*m[3][0] - m[1][1]*m[2][2]*m[3][0] - m[1][2]*m[2][0]*m[3][1] + m[1][0]*m[2][2]*m[3][1] + m[1][1]*m[2][0]*m[3][2] - m[1][0]*m[2][1]*m[3][2] )*alpha;
00141         double inv31 = ( -m[0][2]*m[2][1]*m[3][0] + m[0][1]*m[2][2]*m[3][0] + m[0][2]*m[2][0]*m[3][1] - m[0][0]*m[2][2]*m[3][1] - m[0][1]*m[2][0]*m[3][2] + m[0][0]*m[2][1]*m[3][2] )*alpha;
00142         double inv32 = (  m[0][2]*m[1][1]*m[3][0] - m[0][1]*m[1][2]*m[3][0] - m[0][2]*m[1][0]*m[3][1] + m[0][0]*m[1][2]*m[3][1] + m[0][1]*m[1][0]*m[3][2] - m[0][0]*m[1][1]*m[3][2] )*alpha;
00143         double inv33 = ( -m[0][2]*m[1][1]*m[2][0] + m[0][1]*m[1][2]*m[2][0] + m[0][2]*m[1][0]*m[2][1] - m[0][0]*m[1][2]*m[2][1] - m[0][1]*m[1][0]*m[2][2] + m[0][0]*m[1][1]*m[2][2] )*alpha;
00144 
00145         return new Matrix4x4( inv00, inv01, inv02, inv03, inv10, inv11, inv12, inv13, inv20, inv21, inv22, inv23, inv30, inv31, inv32, inv33 );
00146 }
00147 
00148 Ptr<Matrix4x4> Mul( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& m1, const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& m2 )
00149 {
00150         double r[4][4];
00151         for( int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00152                 for( int j = 0; j < 4; ++j )
00153                         r[i][j] = m1->m[i][0] * m2->m[0][j] +
00154                                   m1->m[i][1] * m2->m[1][j] +
00155                                   m1->m[i][2] * m2->m[2][j] +
00156                                   m1->m[i][3] * m2->m[3][j];
00157         return new Matrix4x4(r);
00158 }
00159 
00160 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Matrix4x4& matrix )
00161 {
00162         for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
00163         {
00164                 os << "[ ";
00165                 for (int j = 0; j < 4; ++j)
00166                 {
00167                         if( fabs( matrix.m[i][j] ) < tgc::Epsilon ) os << "0";
00168                         else os << matrix.m[i][j];
00169                         if (j != 3) os << ", ";
00170                 }
00171                 os << " ] " << std::endl;
00172         }
00173         return os;
00174 }
